title: ASOBO_material_clear_coat_v2 glTF extension
description: Define a material with a clearcoat shader. The result is a material with an additionnal light layer.

clearcoatColorRoughnessTexture.description: Mandatory texture used to determine clearcoat parameters. Color (RGB) is used to determine the color of the clearcoat. If the color equal 0, the clearcoat will appear black. If the color equal 1, the clearcoat will appear transparent. The Roughness (A) drive the roughness of the clearcoated layer. When undefined, the material does not have an additional clearcoated layer.

clearcoatNormalTexture.description: A normal texture used for the clearcoated layer. When undefined, the material does not have a tangent space normal texture.

clearcoatRoughnessFactor.description: Controls a factor on the clearcoat roughness.

clearcoatNormalFactor.description: Controls the scale on the clearcoat normal.

clearcoatColorRoughnessTiling.description: Controls the tiling of the clearcoatColorRoughness texture

clearcoatNormalTiling.description: Controls the tiling of the clearcoatNormal texture

clearcoatInverseRoughness.description: Use to inverse the roughness used for base layer and roughness used for clearcoat layer. if true, the roughness in comp slot is used for the clearcoat layer.

clearcoatBaseRoughness.description: Controls the value of base roughness, only if clearcoatInverseRoughness is set to true.
